locations.name: Sossusvlei
locations.description: Located in the heart of the Namib Desert within the Namib-Naukluft National Park, famous for its towering red sand dunes like Dune 45, the white clay pan of Deadvlei, and exceptional stargazing.

locations.name: Etosha National Park
locations.description: One of Africa's premier wildlife sanctuaries in northern Namibia, characterized by a vast salt pan and numerous waterholes attracting abundant wildlife, including elephants, rhinos, lions, and diverse antelope species.
